original_text: And the Lord has declared today that you are a people for his treasured possession, as he has promised you, and that you are to keep all his commandments,
korean_text: 여호와께서도 네게 말씀하신 대로 오늘 너를 그의 보배로운 백성이 되게 하시고 그의 모든 명령을 지키라 확언하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord has declared today
that you are a people for his treasured possession
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그의 소중한 소유가 된 백성이라고

sentences.original_text: and that you are to keep all his commandments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그의 모든 계명을 지켜야 한다고
